user.title: Menstrual Cycle Tracker Setup
user.description: Set up your cycle tracker below. To improve prediction accuracy, enter up to 3 past periods. The more history you provide, the better the predictions will be. Enter your most recent period first at the top, then work backwards. All date fields are optional — leave them blank to skip.

data_description.name: A name for this tracker (e.g. My Cycle). You can create separate trackers for different people.
data_description.cycle1_start: The first day you started bleeding during your most recent period.
data_description.cycle1_end: The last day of bleeding for that period. Leave blank if it is still ongoing.
data_description.cycle2_start: The first day of bleeding for the period before that.
data_description.cycle2_end: The last day of bleeding for that period.
data_description.cycle3_start: The first day of bleeding for your third most recent period.
data_description.cycle3_end: The last day of bleeding for that period.

error.end_without_start: An end date was provided without a start date. Please enter the start date first.
error.end_before_start: The end date must be after the start date.
